location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'In the European quarter, Bagdad.' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:97 x 124 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘41’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterView in the European quarter, Baghdad.A group of women stand in the centre of the image. In the right background a minaret can be seen. From left tall palms rise behind a high stone wall while from right a row of houses, with several projecting mashrabiyyas, extend into the centre background.InscriptionsInk, below image: 'Near the Customs House, Bagdad.'Pencil, above image at right: ‘41’;’19’
